Elon said ‚Äúgo f*ck yourself‚Äù to Disney‚Äôs Bob Iger yesterday & it reminds me how many people are starting to do the same.

You don‚Äôt have to be Elon or rich to push back but you do have to practice courage & out-create the consequences.

I have been pushing back for years & I‚Äôve kept all my companies private, never taken money from the institutions so that I never had to ‚Äútake a knee & kiss the ring.‚Äù This forced me to come up with better solutions for my businesses & lifestyle.

Congratulations to all of you who are also pushing back against corporations, media, institutions, elite establishment, big banks, big pharma, the status quo & political correctness.

Keep it up, a revolution is coming.
And if you read this far and don‚Äôt agree go f*ck yourself.
